trans-unit.target: Tem certeza de que deseja excluir o(s) item(ns) selecionado(s)?

trans-unit.source: Pick a location to extract this compressed archive to. You'll need to stay in the current folder until we're done. A new tab will open up with the extracted items.
trans-unit.target: Pick a location to extract this compressed archive to. You'll need to stay in the current folder until we're done. A new tab will open up with the extracted items.

trans-unit.source: To get started, you'll need to grant us permission to display your files. This will open a Settings page where you can grant us this permission. You'll need to reopen the app once completed.
trans-unit.target: To get started, you'll need to grant us permission to display your files. This will open a Settings page where you can grant us this permission. You'll need to reopen the app once completed.

trans-unit.source: Enter an item name without an extension
trans-unit.target: Enter an item name without an extension

trans-unit.source: Create a new item (Ctrl + Shift + N)
trans-unit.target: Create a new item (Ctrl + Shift + N)

trans-unit.source: An item with this name already exists in this directory.
trans-unit.target: An item with this name already exists in this directory.

trans-unit.source: We weren't able to delete this item
trans-unit.target: We weren't able to delete this item

trans-unit.source: Please insert the necessary drive to access this item.
trans-unit.target: Please insert the necessary drive to access this item.

trans-unit.source: The file you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: The file you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.

trans-unit.source: The file you are attempting to preview may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: The file you are attempting to preview may have been moved or deleted.

trans-unit.target: The folder you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.

trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para a operação solicitada.
